items.sentence: I knew that Tom might be required to do that.
I knew that Tom would likely have to do that.
I knew that Tom would likely need to do that.
I knew that Tom would likely want to do that.
I knew that Tom would show me how to do that.
I knew that Tom would tell me how to do that.
I knew that Tom wouldn't ask Mary to do that.
I knew that Tom wouldn't have fun doing that.
I know that Tom and Mary have both done that.
I thought that you said you hated doing that.
